00022 #include "Posture.h"
00023 
00024 Posture::Posture(unsigned int ID, unsigned int num)
00025 {
00026         postureID = ID;
00027         numNodes = num;
00028 
00029         nodePs = new Coord[numNodes];
00030         nodeRadius = new double[numNodes];
00031         nodeSpeed =  new double[numNodes];
00032 
00033         alphaMean = new double*[numNodes];
00034         for (int i=0;i<numNodes;++i)
00035                 alphaMean[i] = new double[numNodes];
00036 
00037         alphaSD = new double*[numNodes];
00038         for (int i=0;i<numNodes;++i)
00039                 alphaSD[i] = new double[numNodes];
00040 }
00041 
00042 bool Posture::setPs(unsigned int i , Coord ps)
00043 {
00044         if (i<numNodes){
00045                 nodePs[i] = ps;
00046                 return true;
00047         }
00048         return false;
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool Posture::setPostureName(char *str)
00052 {
00053         strcpy(posture_name,str);
00054         return true;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 bool Posture::setAlphaMean(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, double alpha_mean)
00059 {
00060         if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes){
00061                 alphaMean[i][j] = alpha_mean;
00062                 return true;
00063         }
00064         return false;
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool Posture::setAlphaSD(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, double alpha_sd)
00068 {
00069         if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes){
00070                 alphaSD[i][j] = alpha_sd;
00071                 return true;
00072         }
00073         return false;
00074 }

00076 bool Posture::setRadius(unsigned int i, double radius)
00077 {
00078         if (i<numNodes){
00079                 nodeRadius[i] = radius;
00080                 return true;
00081         }
00082         return false;
00083 }

00085 bool Posture::setSpeed(unsigned int i , double speed)
00086 {
00087         if (i<numNodes){
00088                 nodeSpeed[i] = speed;
00089                 return true;
00090         }
00091         return false;
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool Posture::setPostureSpeed(double min, double max)
00095 {
00096         if (max < min)
00097                 return false;
00098 
00099         postureMaxSpeed = max;
00100         postureMinSpeed = min;
00101         return true;
00102 }
00103 
00104 Coord  Posture::getPs(unsigned int i)
00105 {
00106         if (i<numNodes)
00107                 return nodePs[i];
00108 
00109         return Coord(-1,-1,-1);
00110 }
00111 
00112 double Posture::getAlphaMean(unsigned int i, unsigned int j)
00113 {
00114         if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes)
00115                 return alphaMean[i][j];
00116 
00117         return -1;
00118 }
00119 
00120 double Posture::getAlphaSD(unsigned int i, unsigned int j)

00122         if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes)
00123                 return alphaSD[i][j];

00164 bool Posture::isMobile()
00165 {
00166         return postureMaxSpeed > 0;
